title: Nettle-water

properties.name: description
properties.value: Nettle-water is an item created in the process of making nettle tea. This item is made by adding nettles to a bowl of water. This does not require a Cooking level and gives the player 1 experience point. The player is healed 1 Hitpoint when drunk. However, it is not advised to consume this item because it has potential to heal more when made into tea. Nettle-water can be cooked on a range or fire to produce nettle tea. This item is usually only used during the Ghosts Ahoy quest and the Skippy and the Mogres miniquest.

Nettle-water is an item created in the process of making nettle tea. This item is made by adding nettles to a bowl of water. This does not require a Cooking level and gives the player 1 experience point. The player is healed 1 Hitpoint when drunk. However, it is not advised to consume this item because it has potential to heal more when made into tea. Nettle-water can be cooked on a range or fire to produce nettle tea. This item is usually only used during the Ghosts Ahoy quest and the Skippy and the Mogres miniquest.
